message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-value item at a competitive price. My initial offer is $1,300,000.
Hello Alice, thanks for your offer. This product is very interesting to me, but the price is a bit high for me right now. I'd be willing to buy it for $1,050,000.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $1,050,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. My revised offer is $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product.
